p: The TPC of the tinctures was determined by the Folinâ€“Ciocalteu method using gallic acid and rutin as the reference standards according to the analytical procedure described in the publications [ 25, 41]. Gallic acid was chosen as it had been identified as a phenolic compound in S. montana [ 1]. Rutin was chosen as commercially available reference standard. Moreover, rutin [ 9, 30] and flavonoids with quercetin aglycon were identified in S. montana [ 28].
